text: Lovell is a town in the American state of Wyoming. It is located in Big Horn County. Lovell is the biggest town in the county. It is near the Shoshone river. It has an area of 1.1 miÂ². All of this area is land. At the 2020 census, it had 2,243 people living in it. == References == Category:Towns in Wyoming Category:Big Horn County, Wyoming
title: Lovell, Wyoming
